com.sri.kernel.i2c
Class SMBusOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  com.sri.kernel.i2c.SMBusOutputStream
public abstract class SMBusOutputStream
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an I2C output data stream using the SMBus protocol.

Version:
1.5
Author:
Joseph Monti, Smart Robots
See Also:
I2CPort

writeBlockData

public abstract void writeBlockData(int reg,
                                    int length,
                                    byte[] values)
                             throws java.io.IOException
This will write a block of data to the I2C devices register [reg].

Parameters:
reg - The register on the I2C device at which to write.
length - The number of bytes to write to the I2C device.
values - The bytes to write to the I2C device.
